title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 170.10 - Exchange of information with Department of Taxation and Finance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 170.10 - Exchange of information with Department of Taxation and Finance

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any provision of this chapter, employees and
officers of the department and the Department of Taxation and Finance shall be
allowed and are directed to share and exchange information regarding the
credits applied for, allowed, or claimed pursuant to this Part and taxpayers
who are applying for credits or who are claiming credits, including information
contained in or derived from credit claim forms submitted to the department and
applications for credit submitted to the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
170.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
